2    | $Header: wn_scrol.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:50:29 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | 
4    | ***************************************************************************/
5    | 
6    | #include "video/v_video.h"
7    | #include "window.h"
8    | 
9    | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
10   |     FUNCTION: wn_scroll()
11   |      PURPOSE: Scroll a window up or down
12   |       SYNTAX: int wn_scroll(WINDOW *w, int i);
13   |               WINDOW *w : pointer to WCB of window to scroll
14   |               int i     : number of lines to scroll.
15   |                           i > 0 --> scroll up i lines
16   |                           i < 0 --> scroll down i lines
17   |  DESCRIPTION: Routines taken from C-Chest (CURSES) from Allen Holub, pp 360.
18   |               The window to scroll will alway become the active window
19   |      RETURNS: Status of window's scroll-ok flag or:
20   |               NO_WINDOW if no window opened
21   |      HISTORY: 910801 V0.1 - Initial version
22   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
23   | int wn_scroll(WINDOW *w, int i)
24   | {
25   |   char *ptr;
26   |   int  xsize;
27   |   int  ysize;
28   | 
29   |   wn_log("wn_scroll(window=%p,%s,lines=%1d)\n",w,w->title,i);
30   | 
31   |   /*---------------------------------------
32   |     Check if scrolling has to be performed
33   |   ---------------------------------------*/
34   |   if (i == 0)
35   |     return(-1);
36   | 
37   |   /*------------------------
38   |     Check if window opened
39   |   --------------------------*/
40   |   if (!w)
41   |     return(NO_WINDOW);
42   | 
43   |   /*---------------------------------------
44   |     Check if scrolling is OK
45   |   ---------------------------------------*/
46   |   if (!w->scroll_ok)
47   |     return(-2);
48   | 
49   |   /*-------------------------------------------------------------
50   |     Check if this is the active (top) window. If not, make it so
51   |   --------------------------------------------------------------*/
52   |   if (w != top_window)
53   |     wn_top(w);
54   | 
55   |   xsize = w->x2 - w->x1 + 1;
56   |   ysize = w->y2 - w->y1 + 1;
57   | 
58   |   /*-------------------------------------------------------------
59   |     Allocate enough memory for saving the contents of the window
60   |   ---------------------------------------------------------------*/
61   |   ptr = (char *) calloc(xsize*ysize*2,1);
62   |   if (!ptr)
63   |   {
64   |     fprintf(stderr,"Not enough memory to save window\n");
65   |     return(-3);
66   |   }
67   | 
68   |   if (i > 0) {
69   |     /*---------------------------------------
70   |       SCROLL UP:
71   |       Copy the part of the window to scroll
72   |       Past the part in the window
73   |       Clear the remainder
74   |     ---------------------------------------*/
75   |     v_gettext(w->x1,w->y1+i,w->x2 ,w->y2,  ptr);
76   |     v_puttext(w->x1,w->y1,  w->x2 ,w->y2-i,ptr);
77   |     wn_fill(w,ysize-1,0,xsize,1,' ',w->wcolor);
78   |  }
79   | 
80   |   if ( i < 0) {
81   |     /*---------------------------------------
82   |       SCROLL DOWN:
83   |       Copy the part of the window to scroll
84   |       Past the part in the window
85   |       Clear the remainder
86   |     ---------------------------------------*/
87   |     v_gettext(w->x1,w->y1,  w->x2, w->y2+i,ptr);  /* i is negative !!! */
88   |     v_puttext(w->x1,w->y1-i,w->x2, w->y2  ,ptr);
89   |     wn_fill(w,0,0,xsize,1,' ',w->wcolor);
90   |   }
91   | 
92   |   free(ptr);
93   | 
94   |   /*--------------------------------
95   |     Return status of scroll_ok flag
96   |   ----------------------------------*/
97   |   return(w->scroll_ok);
98   | }
